snippet: Jasmine Carrero grew up severely myopic and eventually went legally blind, but she didn’t discover why until her son lost sight in one of his eyes.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of several charities supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Jasmine Carrero, who is legally blind, buy furniture for her apartment.
lead_paragraph: Jasmine Carrero grew up severely myopic and eventually went legally blind, but she didn’t discover why until her son lost sight in one of his eyes.

headline.print_headline: Answer To Blindness Was Hidden In the Genes
headline.main: Answer to Blindness Was Hidden in the Genes
